triageFlags.title: Missing Credit Report
triageFlags.description: The credit report for this proposal is missing.
triageFlags.recommendation: Decline the proposal unless a valid credit report is provided.
triageFlags.reasoning: Credit report data is mandatory for any loan approval process to assess the applicant's creditworthiness. Without it, the underwriting process cannot be completed as stipulated by company policy.

triageFlags.title: Exceeds Maximum LTV For Credit Tier B
triageFlags.description: The Loan-to-Value ratio is within the policy limit for Credit Tier B but should be monitored.
triageFlags.recommendation: Verify that all other aspects of the deal align with policy, and proceed with caution due to this high LTV.
triageFlags.reasoning: As per Policy Section 4.1, the maximum LTV for Credit Tier B is specified as 100%. The calculated LTV is 67.97% which complies with the policy but is slightly elevated, making the deal riskier.

triageFlags.title: Debt-to-Income Ratio Well Within Threshold
triageFlags.description: The Debt-to-Income ratio is well below the limit for Tier B.
triageFlags.recommendation: There are no affordability concerns based on DTI.
triageFlags.reasoning: According to Policy Section 3.1, the maximum DTI threshold for Tier B applicants is 40%. The calculated DTI for this application is only 8%, indicating strong affordability.

triageFlags.title: Vehicle Age and Mileage Within Policy Limits
triageFlags.expectedValue: 8 years max at start, 12 years max at end
triageFlags.description: The vehicle meets the age and mileage criteria.
triageFlags.recommendation: No action required regarding vehicle age or mileage.
triageFlags.reasoning: As per Policy Section 4.2, the maximum age of a vehicle must not exceed 8 years at the start of the agreement and cannot be older than 12 years by the end of the loan term. This vehicle is 4 years old and will only be 8 years old at the end of a 48-month term. Its mileage is 48,024, also well below the 100,000 mile limit.

triageFlags.title: Loan Term Matches Policy
triageFlags.expectedValue: 48 months max for vehicles over 5 years old
triageFlags.description: The loan term is within policy limits.
triageFlags.recommendation: Proceed with the term as specified.
triageFlags.reasoning: As per Policy Section 4.3, vehicles over 5 years old are limited to a term of 48 months. Since this vehicle is 4 years old, the 48-month term complies with this policy limit.
